remarks: De Morgan's law for GLB and LUB. This holds in any complete ortholattice, although we assume ` HL ` for convenience.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Jan-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
glbcon.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
glbcon.u $e |- U = ( lub ` K ) $.
glbcon.g $e |- G = ( glb ` K ) $.
glbcon.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
glbconN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ S C_ B ) -> ( G ` S ) = ( ._|_ ` ( U ` { x e. B | ( ._|_ ` x ) e. S } ) ) ) $.
$d ._|_ x $.
$d B x $.
$d S x $.
